product_overview: CalculaTú SmartWeb is a user-friendly, AI-powered supermarket shopping assistant designed to simplify and enhance the shopping experience. Featuring a sleek liquid glass aesthetic, real-time BCV exchange rates, an intelligent calculator, and Savara AI chat and voice assistant, it helps users manage shopping items effortlessly with stress-free interactions optimized for one-handed use.
core_goals: Provide a friendly and approachable shopping assistant that reduces the complexity of managing shopping lists and prices.
Deliver real-time currency conversion using up-to-date BCV exchange rates with history and delta tracking.
Integrate Savara AI for voice and text interactions to assist users dynamically throughout their shopping experience.
Offer a visually appealing, highly legible, and fluid user interface optimized for mobile-first use in fast-paced supermarket environments.
Ensure user identity persistence and profile syncing for a personalized and seamless experience across devices.
key_features: Calculator Logic that allows adding, removing, and updating shopping items with automatic price conversions using the latest BCV rates.
Exchange Rates System fetching live BCV rates with historical records and delta indicators to inform users of currency fluctuations.
Savara AI assistant enabling text and voice interactions powered by the Gemini API, with real-time feedback and voice status indicators.
User Identity & Profiles management with machine ID generation and synchronization via Supabase for personalized data.
Elegant liquid glass design with glassmorphism effects, luminous teal/green highlights, and fluid micro-interactions enhancing engagement without distraction.
Mobile-first interface with optimized thumb-zone placement, large headers for quick totals visibility, and accessibility features for broad usability.
user_flow_summary: Users start by viewing the main calculator interface showing current items and total prices converted with live BCV rates.
Users add, edit, or remove shopping items, instantly seeing updated totals and currency conversion results.
When desired, users activate Savara AI for voice or chat assistance, receiving real-time feedback and suggestions.
Exchange rates update in the background with clear delta displays to inform users of rate changes.
User profiles sync in the background to maintain personalized settings and shopping data across sessions and devices.
All user interactions feature subtle animations and immediate visual feedback for a smooth, intuitive experience.
validation_criteria: Accuracy of shopping item calculations and price conversion correctness based on live BCV rates.
Reliability and freshness of BCV exchange rates with proper history logging and delta computation.
Responsiveness and naturalness of Savara AI chat and voice interaction powered by the Gemini API.
Consistency of the UI adhering to the liquid glass supermarket survival aesthetic and mobile-first accessibility standards.
Seamless user identity generation and profile syncing without data loss across sessions.
Positive user feedback on ease of use, quick navigation, and the helpfulness of AI interactions in supermarket conditions.
